sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya sedang belajar menghafal abjad.
english translation: I am currently studying to memorize the alphabet.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Setelah kebakaran, sisa-sisa rumah menjadi abu.
english translation: After the fire, the remains of the house turned into ash.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Apakah ada makanan di dalam lemari?
english translation: Is there any food in the fridge?

sentence in indonesian using the words: Hei, ada apa?
english translation: Hey, what's up?

sentence in indonesian using the words: Mari kita lestarikan adat istiadat nenek moyang kita.
english translation: Let's preserve our ancestors' customs.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Adikku akan datang ke pesta nanti malam.
english translation: My younger sibling will come to the party tonight.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia bekerja di bagian administrasi kantor.
english translation: He works in the office's administration department.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Aduh, kepalamu terbentur meja!
english translation: Ouch, your head hit the table!

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kamu agak terlambat hari ini.
english translation: You are quite late today.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia belajar dengan rajin agar bisa meraih cita-citanya.
english translation: He studies diligently so that he can achieve his dreams.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Agen asuransi akan memberikan penawaran terbaik kepada Anda.
english translation: The insurance agent will provide you with the best offer.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya akan menghubungi agen perjalanan untuk memesan tiket pesawat.
english translation: I will contact the travel agent to book the flight tickets.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia adalah ahli dalam bidang ilmu komputer.
english translation: He is an expert in the field of computer science.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kami akan mendiskusikan pemikiran ahli filsafat terkenal ini.
english translation: We will discuss the ideas of this famous philosopher.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong berikan saya segelas air jeruk.
english translation: Please give me a glass of orange juice.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Minum air kelapa sangat menyegarkan di musim panas.
english translation: Drinking coconut water is very refreshing in the summer.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Terbaik untuk menghindari dehidrasi adalah dengan minum air putih.
english translation: The best way to avoid dehydration is by drinking plain water.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kamu harus melakukannya aja, jangan menunggu terlalu lama.
english translation: You should just do it, don't wait too long.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Besok, kita akan pergi ke pantai bersama.
english translation: Tomorrow, we will go to the beach together.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia sering terlihat sibuk akhir-akhir ini.
english translation: He has been appearing busy lately.
